text: do you remember this face yes the bad
guy from squid game well what if i told
you that squid game actually
made his life miserable night fam this
is the unknown struggle story of ha song
tae
[Music]
and it will teach all of us just how
much sacrifice it can take to get what
we want
as you know horsong there was so
incredible playing his character that
people literally hated his face but not
many people know that he only started
acting in his mid 30s i'm just one guy
that came to work part time with my
employer he wasn't rude but he didn't
speak kindly either before that he
worked his body for so many years
selling television sets in russia and
doing planning for a ship building
company back in south korea but then one
fateful night this happened i had dinner
drinks with my co-workers after i got
back home i was watching tv and saw an
audition advertisement since i was drunk
at the time i was like whatever and i
called the number and told me to record
my name he said his name
hung up and surprisingly got in the next
day the start of his acting journey was
lucky however the adventure turned into
an exhausting challenge after more than
failed auditions sangte finally got a
memorable role in a 2016 movie and soon
enough he became the big bully in squid
game from this point on ladies and
gentlemen is where he starts to suffer
more because when he met the director
during the pandemic he had just lost a
lot of weight which was a problem
because his character was supposed to be
a big scary guy and so to keep his role
he was forced to gain 17 kilograms and
with such a sudden change that
definitely took a toll on his body i
gained so much weight in a short period
the muscles of my calf tore my knees
also hurt of course the struggle didn't
end there because see songtae also has a
huge fear of heights my favorite fights
is so severe due to the nature of the
game there were a lot of high sets but
doksu shouldn't be afraid that was the
hardest part and yet
he had to do this
and this for the sake of the story
[Music]
now see right after squid game took over
the world you would think that his
struggles would finally be over right
but as it turns out there was one more
monster he had to face even in the
height of his success because when he
started appearing more in interviews
challenges tv shows red carpets songtay
developed a fear of people i have a
little bit of anthropophobia his
popularity triggered his social phobia
to the point that his anxiety led him to
cancel one of his suits so with all of
these challenges that he faced suffering
health issues being forced to face his
fears and developing war social anxiety
what can we learn from his story well
sometimes what we love can also be the
same thing that breaks us of course
developing horrible health issues
shouldn't be a way for anyone to achieve
success but many of us know exactly what
it feels like to keep on pushing our
bodies and our minds to the limits to
keep providing for our families to keep
achieving our dreams we all know success
requires blood and sweat and just like
in the gruesome squid game it is
important that we are reminded of how
sometimes what we really want in life
can also lead to our biggest tragedy so
night thumb be careful when you chase
what you really want make sure that just
like hor songtae you are surrounded by
love strengthened by your own
determination and passion so you can
bravely face the rough road ahead
because nothing worth keeping in this
life
will ever come without a price
